name: Final Score (2018)
plot: After deadly terrorists abduct his niece at a soccer match, an ex-soldier with lethal fighting skills wages a one-man war to save her and prevent mass destruction.
actors: Aaron McCusker, Dave Bautista, Pierce Brosnan.
info: Final Score is a movie starring Aaron McCusker, Dave Bautista, and Pierce Brosnan. After deadly terrorists abduct his niece at a soccer match...

name: Mission Impossible (2018)
plot: Mission: Impossible - Fallout is a movie starring Tom Cruise, Henry Cavill, and Ving Rhames. Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.
actors: Tom Cruise, Henry Cavill, Ving Rhames, Simon Pegg.

name: Ocean's Eight (2018)
plot: Oceans Eight is a movie starring Sandra Bullock, Cate Blanchett, and Anne Hathaway. Debbie Ocean gathers an all-female crew to attempt an impossible heist at New York Citys yearly Met Gala.
actors: Sandra Bullock, Griffin Dunne, Deidre Goodwin, Daniella Rabbani.

name: The Marine 6 (2018)
plot: After deadly terrorists abduct his niece at a soccer match, an ex-soldier with lethal fighting skills wages a one-man war to save her and prevent mass destruction.
actors: Mike 'The Miz' Mizanin, Shawn Michaels, Rebecca Quin, Louisa Connolly-Burnham.

name: The Equalizer 2 (2018)
plot: The Marine 6: Close Quarters is a movie starring Mike The Miz Mizanin, Shawn Michaels, and Rebecca Quin. Jake Carter and another former Marine, Luke Trapper, join forces to rescue a kidnapped girl from a gang.
actors: Denzel Washington, Pedro Pascal, Ashton Sanders, Orson Bean.

name: Year One (2009)
plot: Year One is a movie starring Jack Black, Michael Cera, and Olivia Wilde. After being banished from their tribe, two hunter-gatherers encounter Biblical characters and eventually wind up in the city of Sodom.
actors: Jack Black, Michael Cera, Oliver Platt, David Cross, Christopher Mintz-Plasse.

name: Yes Man (2008)
plot: Yes Man is a movie starring Jim Carrey, Zooey Deschanel, and Bradley Cooper. A man challenges himself to say yes to everything for an entire year.
actors: Jim Carrey, Zooey Deschanel, Bradley Cooper, John Michael Higgins.

name: The Wedding Singer (1998)
plot: The Wedding Singer is a movie starring Adam Sandler, Drew Barrymore, and Christine Taylor. Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.
actors: Adam Sandler, Drew Barrymore, Christine Taylor, Allen Covert.
